segments.text: It's crunch time , isn't it ? I wasn't nervous before the meeting , but now I am .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No kidding . Time is running out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It would help to bring in a couple more troubleshooters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Vince says he can't afford anybody else . We're got to come through .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think we'll make it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess we'll either make it , or we won't .
segments.speaker: S2
